definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片雖然很殘忍，但是當時的真實寫照。

sentences.english: Akiba undisputed power, I think this is a true portrayal of her.
sentences.chinese: 秋葉不爭功，我想這就是她真實寫照。

sentences.english: Twiggy was a little of both boy and girl, a mirror of her time.
sentences.chinese: 崔姬又像男孩又像女孩，是她當時真實的生活寫照。

sentences.english: However does not understand Yang Hongzhe, widowed", is the real portrayal."
sentences.chinese: 然不曉楊鴻者，寡”，就是真實的寫照。

sentences.english: This is the most true portraiture of 18 water.
sentences.chinese: 這是對十八水最真的寫照。

sentences.english: The countenance is the portrait of the mind, the eyes are its informers.
sentences.chinese: 表情是思維的寫照，眼睛是心靈的穿窗戶。

sentences.english: And that's another kind of doubleness in Frost.
sentences.chinese: 這也是弗羅斯特的另一種雙重寫照。

sentences.english: The two wonderful places, infinitely good scenery. " The song gave a vivid portrayal of Shantang Street."
sentences.chinese: 兩處好地方，無限好風光”便是對山塘的生動寫照。

sentences.english: I came to see, too, that Grandpas garden mirrored his life.
sentences.chinese: 我也發現爺爺的花園是他一生的真實寫照。

sentences.english: "Ever sit with desolate, the evil superfluous in this student" is its portrayal in the sense of loss.
sentences.chinese: “含悽坐永日，所惡贅此生”是其處於失落的寫照。

sentences.english: Like Yubari, Japan is heading into a demographic vortex.
sentences.chinese: 夕張市是一個寫照，整個日本正陷入人口問題的漩渦。

sentences.english: 5】The film is，as it were,a true reflection of the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，這部電影是第二次世界大戰的真實寫照。

sentences.english: That spirit typifies our American family.
sentences.chinese: 這一家人的精神就是全部美國家庭的寫照。

sentences.english: An ideal picture of normal childhood.
sentences.chinese: 這正是正常童年的寫照。

sentences.english: This is another of the great pictures Isaiah has given us of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 這是以賽亞爲耶穌基督勾勒的另一幅重要寫照。
則是君子蘭一個“君子”的寫照。
